mapper.select: select * from member order by id;
mapper.insert: insert into member (id, name, nickname, phone, pwd, email, address1, address2, address3, status, level, role_check, authstatus) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, 1, #{level}, #{role_check}, 1);
